title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Enhancing Preservice Physical Education Teachers' Competencies in Adopting Alternative Pedagogies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of physical education and understanding of traditional teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can explain core principles of alternative game-based teaching methods using the Constraints-Led Approach (CLA)
Learners can reflect on their teaching beliefs reflecting existing physical education paradigms and submit lesson designs applying alternative approaches
Participants can produce demonstration videos of alternative teaching methods incorporating peer feedback using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
